name: Lady Banger
imagePrompt: A dynamic female artist with a microphone, surrounded by swirling musical notes and digital energy, a subtle sparkle in the background, in a vibrant, slightly futuristic concert setting.
abilityText: Battlecry: Summon two 1/1 'Backup Dancers'. Just vibe.
flavorText: No algorithms whispering what she should feel, just pure, unadulterated sound. Also, certified banger. Every. Single. Time.
